title: Collectibles (except CryptoKitties) are not loaded (endless spinner) after relogin
body:
# Bug Report ## Problem CryptoStrickers and EthermonAssets are not loaded after reopening app. If you open Collectibles and tap on CryptoStrickers and EthermonAssets - endless spinner is shown (waited ~5 mins) Reproducible on both Android and IOS. #### Expected behavior Collectibles are loaded #### Actual behavior Endless spinner ![crypti](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/66215895-c4213580-e6c4-11e9-939a-8b83a8e942fc.gif) ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Open Status - Restore account with collectibles (not Cryptokitties) - Reopen app ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) - Status version: nightly 04/10/2019 - Operating System: Android, iOS #### Logs [comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat) Constant error in log: ``` 10-04 16:31:12.563 656 656 E HWComposer: getLayerReleaseFence: Invalid display 10-04 16:31:12.595 656 656 I chatty : uid=1000(system) /system/bin/surfaceflinger identical 4 lines 10-04 16:31:12.595 656 656 E HWComposer: getLayerReleaseFence: Invalid display 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.http:155] - Failed to parse 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: Error 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 
Cannot GET /
10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.603 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: 10-04 16:31:12.609 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:32] - Handling re-frame event: :load-collectible-failure 10-04 16:31:12.612 656 656 E HWComposer: getLayerReleaseFence: Invalid display 10-04 16:31:12.733 656 656 I chatty : uid=1000(system) /system/bin/surfaceflinger identical 14 lines 10-04 16:31:12.733 656 656 E HWComposer: getLayerReleaseFence: Invalid display 10-04 16:31:12.751 27277 27315 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.http:155] - Failed to parse ```
